title: Loading / Entry Ad - Handset
custom_preconds:
Lite users only

Loading/Entry Ad (300X250 for phone and 970X500 for tablet)
QA Site ID = 5225
PROD Site ID = 3275
Section_ID: Gameday
Subsection_ID: androidEntry
Close button shows after 5 sec

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user launches gameday for the first time in 6 hours (configurable in minutes)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then there should be a loading interstitial displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the loading insterstitial is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then there will be a progress bar that says, 'loading' with the ad unit below
and once gameday has successfully loaded then 'loading' will change to 'continue'

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the 'continue' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken into gameday

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user sits on the screen with 'continue' up for > 5 seconds
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be automatically taken into gameday

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user launches gameday again within the 6 hour time frame
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the loading screen should work as it currently does 
And just push the user into gameday

title: Gameday Tab Banner - (tablets / handsets)
custom_preconds:
Lite users only

320X50 banner on each Gameday tab for handset and tablet, bottom of content
QA Site ID = 5225
PROD Site ID = 3275
Section_ID: Gameday
Subsection_ID
Game
Boxscore
Plays
Videos
Field
Color

custom_steps_separated.content: When a Lite user is in gameday
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then they will see a banner on both tablets and handsets
And the banner will be locked at the bottom of each tab

custom_steps_separated.content: Confirm banner on Live, Box, Plays, Videos, Field, and Feed

When the user taps on the ad
And then closes out of the ad
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be brought back into the gameday tab they tapped the ad on

title: Mid-inning Interstitial (tablets / handsets)
custom_preconds:
Lite users only

Ad Marvel 300 X 250 Mid-inning interstitial
Ad Marvel SDK implementation
QA Site ID = 5225
PROD Site ID = 3275
Section_ID: Gameday
Subsection_ID: androidInterstitial
Close button shows after 5 sec
If next inning starts, interstitial dismisses

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the Lite user is in gameday
And the game is between innings
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see an interstitial ad
And the ad will have a 'Close' button after 5 seconds

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps the 'Close' button
Or the user taps outside of the ad on the screen while the 'Close' button is present
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the ad will close

title: Pre-roll on all Gameday Video (tablets / handsets)
custom_preconds:
Lite users only

Pre Roll on all Gameday Video 
FreeWheel implementation
Content ID set at 19191919 for push derived video plays
Targeting Lite site section IDs
AtBat_Android_Lite_condensed.game
AtBat_Android_Lite_video.highlight

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the Lite user accesses a video highlight
or a condensed game
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be served a pre-roll ad

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the pre-roll ad
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to a webview

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user closes the ad webview
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken back into the video player
And the highlight or cg will play successfully

title: Entry Interstitial
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps: When a LITE user navigates to Gameday during a LIVE game
custom_expected:
Then the user will see an entry interstitial ad every 12 hours
-the ad will have a close button
-once the ad has loaded, if the LITE user has not closed the ad unit after 5 seconds, the ad unit will be closed automatically
and Gameday data will load

custom_steps_separated.content: on a handset
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see an entry interstitial ad
and the ad size will be 320x480
(enable Charles SSL proxying; check "securepubads.g.doubleclick.net" response) 

i.e.: 
https://securepubads.g.doubleclick.net/gampad/ads?gdfp_req=1&correlator=3979797814624641&output=json_html&callback=callbackProxy&impl=fif&eid=108809080&sc=0&sfv=1-0-5&iu=%2F2605%2Fmlb.mlb%2Fgame&sz=320x480

custom_steps_separated.content:
on a 7 inch tablet in Portrait
(including the Kindle)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see an entry interstitial ad
and the ad size will be 320x480
(enable Charles SSL proxying; check "securepubads.g.doubleclick.net" response)

i.e.: https://securepubads.g.doubleclick.net/gampad/ads?gdfp_req=1&correlator=3979797814624641&output=json_html&callback=callbackProxy&impl=fif&eid=108809080&sc=0&sfv=1-0-5&iu=%2F2605%2Fmlb.mlb%2Fgame&sz=320x480

custom_steps_separated.content:
on a 7 inch tablet in Landscape
(NOT including the Kindle)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see an entry interstitial ad
and the ad size will be 300x250
(enable Charles SSL proxying; check "securepubads.g.doubleclick.net" response)

https://securepubads.g.doubleclick.net/gampad/...

custom_steps_separated.content: on a larger than 7 inch tablet
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will NOT see an entry interstitial ad

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user enters mid-inning
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the entry interstitial ad will be shown
and NOT the mid-inning interstitial ad

custom_steps_separated.content: When no entry interstitial ad is returned
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then no entry interstitial ad will appear

title: Entry to Gameday
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an Android device
and is viewing At Bat as a LITE user
custom_steps: When the LITE user enters Gameday through different entry points

custom_steps_separated.content: via Push Notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the LITE user should enter Gameday using the default tab for Game Start, Game End, Score Change & Lead Change

(should see entry interstitial if this is first entry in 12 hours)

custom_steps_separated.content: by tapping on Game Cell of LIVE game on Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the LITE user should enter Pitch by Pitch tab

(should see entry interstitial if this is first entry in 12 hours)

custom_steps_separated.content: via Scoreboard Expanded Game Cell link
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the LITE user should enter Pitch by Pitch by default (or the last opened view)

(should see entry interstitial if this is first entry in 12 hours)

custom_steps_separated.content: via Gameday button on Team Schedule
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the LITE user should enter Pitch by Pitch tab

(should see entry interstitial if this is first entry in 12 hours)

custom_steps_separated.content: on initial entry into Gameday
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the LITE user should enter Pitch by Pitch by default (or the last opened view)

(should see entry interstitial if this is first entry in 12 hours)

title: Mid-Inning Video Interstitial
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an Android device
and is viewing At Bat as a LITE user
custom_steps: When a LITE user has been viewing Gameday of a LIVE game

custom_steps_separated.content: When the 3rd out of a half-inning is recorded
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the mid-inning video interstitial will start
and it will be muted (user can unmute)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the mid-inning video interstitial ends
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the ad player will be hidden
and will not show any more ads

custom_steps_separated.content: If the next half-inning starts while the ad is playing
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the ad will immediately end/hide
and no more ads will be shown

custom_steps_separated.content: When no mid-inning video interstitial is returned
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then no mid-inning video interstitial will appear

title: Deep Link
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an Android device
and is viewing At Bat as a LITE user
custom_steps:
When a LITE user enters Gameday from a Deep Link
http://wapqa.mlb.com/test/android/atbat-links.html
custom_expected: Then the LITE user will not see an entry interstitial OR a mid-inning interstitial
